data.name: WorldCreator
data.detailed_description:
IMPORTANT: The Steam version of World Creator is World Creator 1. The description below is meant for World Creator 1 only. We have released World Creator 2, which is a real-time terrain and landcape generator. Please visit https://www.world-creator.com for further information.

WorldCreator is a professional stand-alone terrain creation tool used to create most realistic terrain data for 3D environments used in games, movies and artworks. It empowers the user with the most advanced procedural techniques available nowadays.

The WorldCreator Steam version supports terrain generation up to a maximum resolution of 4096 by 4096. You can use isolines to to creatively control the form of the landscape. Interventions are non-destructive and layer-based, and you can always readjust, switch off or change an isoline or layer at any time in the process.

Artistic "shape" filters give the landscapes a typical natural structure such as round hills or ridged mountains.

The semi-scientific erosion and sediment algorithms can turn these outlines into fantastic, realistic and believable landscapes. In addition, flows, rivers or even entire river networks can be added to the terrain. The algorithm is unique, extremely fast and satisfies even scientific requirements. But landscapes are not only defined by nature. The human factor also is a very important element. The "vector" tool "simulates" this part of a landscape. You can use it to integrate roads, urban areas or even controlled rivers into your terrain.

Terrain created with WorldCreator can be exported to most common image formats (e.g. PNG, TIF, BMP) and RAW files which can be used to create exactly the same terrain in other 3D applications like the Unity Engine, Unreal Engine, Cry Engine, 3DS Max, Maya, Cinema 4D, Vue, Terragen and a lot more!

It is of course also possible to import existing terrain data and also real world terrain data! (supported file formats are RAW 16 and 32 bit, TIF, TGA, PGM, TER, BMP, JPG and PNG)

data.short_description: WorldCreator is a professional stand-alone terrain creation tool used to create most realistic terrain data for 3D environments used in games, movies and artworks. It empowers the user with the most advanced procedural techniques available nowadays.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimos:
  • SO: Microsoft Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 8.1 (64 bit)
  • Processador: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memória: 4 GB de RAM
  • Placa de vídeo: Microsoft DirectX 10.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Versão 10
  • Armazenamento: 1 GB de espaço disponível
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recomendados:
  • SO: Microsoft Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 8.1 (64 bit)
  • Processador: Intel i7 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memória: 8 GB de RAM
  • Placa de vídeo: Microsoft DirectX 11.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Versão 11
  • Armazenamento: 1 GB de espaço disponível

mac_requirements.minimum:
Mínimos:
  • SO: MacOS 10.9.x (64 bit)
  • Processador: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz
  • Memória: 4 GB de RAM
  • Placa de vídeo: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card
  • Armazenamento: 600 MB de espaço disponível
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recomendados:
  • SO: MacOS 10.9.x (64 bit)
  • Processador: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz
  • Memória: 8 GB de RAM
  • Placa de vídeo: OpenGL 4.0 compatible graphics card
  • Armazenamento: 600 MB de espaço disponível
